definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: I am shy and find social situations stressful.
sentences.chinese: 我很怕羞，覺得社會場合有壓力。

sentences.english: So you can also use this pattern in a business setting.
sentences.chinese: 所以你也可以在商務的場合裏使用。

sentences.english: Since then, horses have only been used for ceremonial events or public relations.
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，馬就只用於慶典或公關場合了。

sentences.english: For a formal occasion at the palace you must wear tails.
sentences.chinese: 在宮廷正式的場合中，你應該穿燕尾服。

sentences.english: Don't feel embarrassed about being different from others in public.
sentences.chinese: 不要因爲你在公共場合的與衆不同而發窘。

sentences.english: Now in each case you have instances of knowledge as negation.
sentences.chinese: 在每一個場合你都有”否定知識”的體驗。

sentences.english: Whan an inept remark to make on such a formal occasion.
sentences.chinese: 在如此正式的場合，怎麼說這樣不恰當的話。

sentences.english: Firstly, you supported your local swim shop , but more importantly, you could use your kickboard in more advanced swimming situations.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，你可以把浮板用在更高級的游泳場合。

sentences.english: It is obvious th at A. C. motors are superior to D. C. motors in many appli cations.
sentences.chinese: 顯然，交流電機在許多應用場合比直流電機優越。

sentences.english: We hope to see you on some future occasion.
sentences.chinese: 希望以後在某些場合見到您。

sentences.english: I wish you wouldn't look at me like that when we're in public.
sentences.chinese: 我希望以後在公共場合你不要用那樣的眼神看我了。

sentences.english: Three-level inverters were widely used in medium-voltage high-power domain.
sentences.chinese: 三電平逆變器在中壓大功率場合得到了廣泛的應用。

sentences.english: Others are celebrations where we want to express our congratulations to someone special.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些慶祝的場合我們希望向特別的人表示祝賀。

sentences.english: I would have laughed in different circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 換了是別的場合，她這麼說我會笑得不可開交。

sentences.english: Glittering stars make a subtle statement of prettiness on any occasion.
sentences.chinese: 閃閃發光的星星讓你在任何場合都顯得可愛。

sentences.english: The government intervenes wherever the economy would be vulnerable if left to itself.
sentences.chinese: 凡經濟任其自流就會出問題的場合，政府就要干預。

definition: workplace/workforce (of a nation or industry etc)/job market
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent
to do with difficulty/to force sb to do sth/reluctant/barely enough
every kind of/all kinds of/various kinds
